```{r summary-stats}

summary_table <- function(data, summary_funcs) {
  
  data %>%
    dplyr::summarise_all(summary_funcs) %>%
    tidyr::pivot_longer(
      cols = everything(),
      names_to = c("variable", "stat"),
      names_pattern = "(.*)_(.*)",
      values_to = "value"
    ) %>%
    tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = "stat", values_from = "value")
  
}

summary_funcs <- list(
  obs = ~ length(.),
  ms = ~ sum(is.na(.)),
  mean = mean,
  sd = sd,
  min = min,
  q25 = ~ quantile(., 0.25),
  median = median,
  q75 = ~ quantile(., 0.75),
  max = max
)

```
